1.title: OT Night Out 🍜
1.sub-title: No worries about tasks, this tool handles everything
1.description: OTOMATA is a freelance project born to help 💪 office workers automate office tasks in their company, with just a few days' salary and a few clicks.

2.title: What will OTOMATA do for you?

first.1: Run complex workflows with tools designed specifically for you or your company, with easy-to-understand and simple processes.
first.2: You schedule a consultation, wait for me to finish the app and deliver it to you, you enter the data, configure the tool, and then press the run button.

second.1: Automate the manual processes and tasks you have to repeat year-round.
second.2: Can automate niche processes that current market automation products can't handle.

third.2: Get 30% off the cost of redesigning the tool when your office tasks change.

4.title: Ready to talk?
4.description: Whether you've got an emergency that requires a rapid solution, or just interested in discussing how the platform might stop on in the future, we're here to talk.
